pages.text: The $(item)Fish Fighter$() enchantment on a fishing rod can be used alongside other enchantments, such as $(item)Luck of the Sea$() and $(item)Lure$(), to increase your chances of obtaining treasure and speed up bite times.$(br2)For information on how to obtain the $(item)Fish Fighter$() enchantment itself, refer to the Fish Fighter Enchantment section of this book.
